body_html:
@mkalininait I think the problem is in the definition of current team
def current_team @current_team ||= current_user.teams.first end
and on your profile ,it seems like the teams are sorted by chronological order, so if I wasn't mistaken, this makes "Team Rackless pinguins [2016] " the first team , therefore = @current_team
link_to 'My Team', current_student.current_team, class: 'btn btn-default btn-sm' if current_student.current_team

Hope this helps 😃
body_text:
@mkalininait I think the problem is in the definition of current team
def current_team @current_team ||= current_user.teams.first end
and on your profile ,it seems like the teams are sorted by chronological order, so if I wasn't mistaken, this makes "Team Rackless pinguins [2016] " the first team , therefore = @current_team
link_to 'My Team', current_student.current_team, class: 'btn btn-default btn-sm' if current_student.current_team
Hope this helps 😃
body:
@mkalininait I think the problem is in the definition of current team
`  def current_team
    @current_team ||= current_user.teams.first
  end`
and on your profile ,it seems like the teams are sorted by chronological order, so if I wasn't mistaken, this makes "Team Rackless pinguins [2016] " the first team , therefore = @current_team
`link_to 'My Team', current_student.current_team, class: 'btn btn-default btn-sm' if current_student.current_team`

Hope this helps 😃
